entries.title: ANC conference: SA President Ramaphosa struggles to stop hecklers in own party
entries.description: President Cyril Ramaphosa is disrupted during the opening speech of the ANC party conference.

entries.title: The Papers: 'Get a grip PM' and King 'seeks peace' with Harry
entries.description: Saturday's front pages focus on the NHS strikes and tensions within the Royal Family.

entries.title: Hospitals told to free up beds for ambulance strike
entries.description: Health bosses warn of "extensive disruption" as staff are set to walk out on December 21 and 28.

entries.title: Birmingham City 3-2 Reading: Troy Deeney double as Blues down Royals
entries.description: Birmingham City move up to seventh in the Championship as Troy Deeney's early double helps beat Paul Ince's Reading.

entries.title: Joe Kennedy III set to be named as US special envoy to Northern Ireland
entries.description: It is believed Mr Kennedy, a member of the Kennedy political dynasty, could be appointed within days.

entries.title: World Cup final and third-place predictions: Chris Sutton predicts Argentina v France and Croatia v Morocco
entries.description: BBC Sport's football expert Chris Sutton predicts the scores for the World Cup final between Argentina and France and the third-place play-off in Qatar.

entries.title: Vllaznia 0-4 Chelsea: Blues cruise into European quarter-finals
entries.description: Chelsea claim a quarter-final spot in the Women's Champions League with ease after beating Vllaznia in their penultimate group match.

entries.title: Investigation after two boys found dead in London home
entries.description: Police are investigating after two boys were found dead at a home in Dagenham, east London.

entries.title: World Cup 2022: Behind the scenes of Lionel Messi's legendary semi-final performance against Croatia
entries.description: Watch behind-the-scenes footage and match action from Lionel Messi's stunning semi-final performance in Argentina's World Cup semi-final win against Croatia.

entries.title: Brittney Griner vows to play this season after prisoner swap
entries.description: The basketball star speaks for the first time since her release from Russian custody last week.

entries.title: Emma Raducanu appoints Sebastian Sachs as new coach
entries.description: Former US Open champion Emma Raducanu appoints 30-year-old Sebastian Sachs as her new coach.

entries.title: Avanti West Coast rewarded with £6.5m in bonuses
entries.description: The train company received bonuses last year, but has been criticised for poor service this year.

entries.title: Sweden Furuvik zoo: Anger over shooting of chimpanzees in zoo escape
entries.description: Critics ask why the Swedish zoo shot the chimpanzees instead of tranquilising them.

entries.title: Harry and Meghan: What's the link between stress and miscarriage?
entries.description: Harry and Meghan say they lost a baby due to stress but experts say we need more miscarriage research.

entries.title: BA and Virgin halt ticket sales to Heathrow on strike days
entries.description: The airlines were asked by the airport to "suppress demand" as Border Force staff go on strike.

entries.title: Rishi Sunak orders audit of Ukraine war progress, source says
entries.description: Senior figures fear the PM may be taking an overly cautious approach as the war enters a key phase.

entries.title: Amazon workers in Coventry vote for strike action
entries.description: More than 98% of them backed strikes after an offer of a 50p per hour pay rise, the GMB union says.

entries.title: Pokemon to go on without Ash Ketchum and Pikachu
entries.description: The long-time lead characters of the anime series will bow out in January, as the show continues.

entries.title: Who is striking? How Saturday 17 December’s walkouts will affect you
entries.description: Travel disruption the weekend before Christmas - the BBC’s Zoe Conway has what you need to know.

entries.title: World Cup 2022: Ill France players 'staying in their rooms'
entries.description: The French Football Federation have confirmed several France players have caught colds, with defenders Raphael Varane and Ibrahima Konate the latest to miss training.

entries.title: Sinisa Mihajlovic dies after long battle with leukaemia
entries.description: Former AC Milan and Bologna boss Sinisa Mihajlovic dies at the age of 53 following a long battle with leukaemia.

entries.title: World Cup 2022: Achraf Hakimi's motherly love & road to top with Morocco
entries.description: Images of Achraf Hakimi embracing his mother on Morocco's run during the World Cup have gone viral - now he has one last dance in Qatar.

entries.title: What's the best way to heat a room this winter?
Ngozi Fulani receives personal apology at Palace
entries.description: Lady Susan Hussey has given a personal apology to charity founder Ngozi Fulani after asking her where she was "really from".

entries.title: English Open: Mark Williams becomes oldest player to make a 147 break
entries.description: Triple world champion Mark Williams becomes the oldest player to make a 147 break, but loses his English Open quarter-final 5-3 to Neil Robertson.

entries.title: Leicester and Ealing set to join women's Premier 15s as four clubs miss out
entries.description: Leicester are set to become the latest men's Premiership club to field a side in the women's Premier 15s, with Ealing also offered a place in the league.

entries.title: Wes Streeting: I won't pretend NHS is envy of world
entries.description: The shadow health secretary says the NHS needs reform as he attacks left-wing critics of his ideas.

entries.title: Beau Greaves: Five facts about 18-year-old darts sensation
entries.description: Beau Greaves will make darts history at Alexandra Palace on Friday as the youngest woman to compete at the PDC World Championships.

entries.title: Missing RAF crew who crashed on secret mission found 76 years later
entries.description: The pair, who were on a secret mission with a new bomb design, crashed in North Yorkshire in 1944.

entries.title: World Cup final: Argentina v France - Didier Deschamps aiming for back-to-back triumphs
entries.description: France boss Didier Deschamps is on the verge of winning his third World Cup and his second as a manager - but how has he done it?

entries.title: Katherine Jenkins to pull out of Pope concert over lost luggage
entries.description: The singer says she cannot perform in Rome on Saturday after accusing BA of losing her bags.

entries.title: World Cup 2022: Croatia v Morocco
entries.description: Morocco head coach Walid Regragui says his players can be proud that they are playing a seventh game at the 2022 World Cup, even though it is not Sunday's final.

entries.title: Rishi Sunak says nurses' pay offer appropriate and fair
entries.description: The prime minister is refusing to bow to pressure from health leaders to increase the offer.

entries.title: Flu hospital admission rates shoot up to overtake Covid
entries.description: The under-fives and over-85s are most likely to become ill - getting a jab is urged.

entries.title: Brixton Academy: What happened in the crush?
entries.description: Social media videos and eyewitness accounts show a crush, the venue doors breached and violent clashes.

entries.title: Club World Cup: Fifa to stage 32-team tournament from June 2025 - president Gianni Infantino
entries.description: Fifa will stage an expanded Club World Cup featuring 32 men's teams from June 2025, says its president Gianni Infantino.

entries.title: World Cup 2022: Fifa to reconsider format of 2026 World Cup after 'best ever' tournament
entries.description: Fifa is to reconsider the format of the 2026 World Cup following the success of the four-group format at the 2022 tournament, says president Gianni Infantino.

entries.title: UK weather: More snow and ice due before cold snap ends
entries.description: Snow and ice are set to cause disruption over the next few days as the Met Office issues yellow warnings.

entries.title: Pakistan v England: Ben Stokes' side aim for history in Karachi
entries.description: Christmas lights await England, but not before the chance of a 3-0 clean sweep over Pakistan in Karachi, the 'City of Lights'.

entries.title: Megan Newborough murder: Man who strangled girlfriend jailed for life
entries.description: Ross McCullam strangled 23-year-old Megan Newborough before slashing her throat 14 times.

entries.title: Woman and children in Kettering murder case named by police
entries.description: A hospital nurse and two young children were found seriously hurt in a property and later died.

entries.title: Twitter blocks users from sharing Mastodon links
entries.description: The social media giant has also suspended the Twitter account of its new rival.

entries.title: RFU rejects Worcester plan for Championship return, but approves Wasps application
entries.description: Worcester's application to return to professional rugby next season is rejected by the RFU, but Wasps are approved.

entries.title: Big Bash League: Sydney Thunder bowled out for 15 by Adelaide Strikers
entries.description: Sydney Thunder are dismissed for 15 - the lowest score in men's Twenty20 history - as they are thrashed by Adelaide Strikers in the BBL.

entries.title: December strikes: Both sides need to work ‘quickly’ to end strikes
entries.description: The RMT union boss says "a bit of goodwill" is needed from all sides involved in the dispute.

entries.title: Warhammer film and TV show in the pipeline after Games Workshop's Amazon deal
entries.description: The project will initially involve developing the Warhammer 40,000 universe, Games Workshop said.

entries.title: England forward Beth Mead has signed a new contract with Arsenal
entries.description: Arsenal confirm that England forward Beth Mead has signed a new contract with the club.

entries.title: Jane Fonda: Hollywood star 'feels blessed' her cancer is in remission
entries.description: The Hollywood icon says her doctor has told her she can stop her chemotherapy treatment.

entries.title: Qatar: Why women feel safer at World Cup 2022
entries.description: Many female fans say they welcome the ban on selling alcohol in World Cup stadiums.

entries.title: Peak ScotRail fares to be scrapped for six months
entries.description: The pilot scheme to encourage more people to travel by train will begin in April next year.

entries.title: World Cup 2022: 'I've tattooed England players'
entries.description: Gabriel Maniak's tattoos on Phil Foden, Raheem Sterling and others have been seen by millions.

entries.title: Berlin's giant AquaDom aquarium containing 1,500 fish explodes
entries.description: Two people are injured as the aquarium, containing a million litres of water, bursts open.

entries.title: Amber weather warning as heavy snow hits central Scotland
entries.description: Wintry conditions are affecting some of Scotland's main commuter routes as snow hits the central belt.

entries.title: Nurses' strikes: Union warns of more action unless pay talks open
entries.description: The dispute could escalate in the new year with further industrial action, nursing union warns.

entries.title: World Cup 2022: Test your knowledge of Qatar 2022
entries.description: The World Cup has nearly reached its conclusion - but how much do you remember of Qatar 2022?

entries.title: Sport Personality of the Year shortlist to be announced on 20 December
entries.description: The shortlist for BBC Sports Personality of the Year 2022 will be announced on Tuesday, 20 December.

entries.title: Pakistan v England: Rehan Ahmed to become youngest man to play for England
entries.description: Leg-spinner Rehan Ahmed will become the youngest man to play Test cricket for England after being handed a debut in the third Test against Pakistan.

entries.title: NFL: San Francisco 49ers beat Seattle Seahawks 21-13 to seal NFC West title and play-off place
entries.description: The San Francisco 49ers become the second NFL team to seal a place in this season's play-offs by winning 21-13 at divisional rivals Seattle Seahawks.

entries.title: Russia launches renewed strikes across Ukraine
entries.description: Power is down in Kharkiv and blasts are reported in several cities as alerts go off across the country.

entries.title: Woman's luggage turns up five months after luxury holiday
entries.description: The 42-year-old from Fife had to buy cheap replacement clothes from a market on the five-star trip.

entries.title: Lyon fire: Ten dead, including five children
entries.description: Four people are in a critical condition after the fire in an apartment block in south-west France.

entries.title: Early Christmas shopping boosts November food sales
entries.description: People stocked up early on food for the festive season, figures show, but overall sales fell in November.

entries.title: Brixton Academy: Four in critical condition after incident at Asake gig
entries.description: Police say the injuries are believed to have been caused by crushing at the O2 Academy in south London.

entries.title: World Cup 2022: Bellingham, Gakpo, Fernandez and other breakout stars
entries.description: BBC Sport examines the young players who have impressed with their performances at the 2022 World Cup in Qatar.

entries.title: Formula 1: George Russell says Mercedes will be strong 'from race one' in 2023
entries.description: Mercedes driver George Russell expects the team to be "in a much stronger position from race one" in Formula 1 in 2023.

entries.title: World Cup 2022: Marcus Rashford, Richarlison and Kylian Mbappe feature in best goals
entries.description: Watch some of the best goals from the 2022 World Cup, featuring Marcus Rashford's free-kick for England against Wales and strikes by Brazil forward Richarlison and Kylian Mbappe of France.

entries.title: 'Use my correct title': Australia's female Speaker repeatedly called 'Mr'
entries.description: Opposition leader Peter Dutton called Sharon Claydon "Mr Speaker" in parliament on Thursday.

entries.title: Ukraine says Russia planning offensive
entries.description: President Zelensky and senior officials warn that Kyiv and its allies must guard against complacency.

entries.title: Is the NHS pay review body independent?
entries.description: Nurses are striking over a pay offer recommended by a review body.

entries.title: Twitter locks out top journalists covering Musk
entries.description: Some reporters for the New York Times, CNN and Washington Post have had their accounts suspended.

entries.title: Malaysia landslide leaves campers dead or missing
entries.description: Rescuers are scrambling to save scores of people at a camping site just north of the capital

entries.title: Livestock farming polluted rivers 300 times in one year
entries.description: Only six farms are prosecuted for pollution despite 300 river contaminations in one year.

entries.title: Biodiversity: Row over funding threatens to stall talks
entries.description: Countries are promising new funds to help protect 30% of the planet for nature but will it secure a deal?

entries.title: After the FTX chaos, is crypto down and out after a torrid 2022?
entries.description: If Bitcoin was a boxer it would be on its back on the canvas. It is down but is it out?

entries.title: Toxic spinach causes hallucinations and delirium in Australia
entries.description: Authorities have urged anyone suffering from a range of severe symptoms after eating it to go to hospital.

entries.title: Climate boss Carney's firm linked with deforestation
entries.description: Brookfield sold Brazil farms despite boss's call not to "walk away" from carbon-intensive assets

entries.title: How Antwerp became the cocaine gateway to Europe
entries.description: Belgian authorities seized so much of the drug in 2022 that they are struggling to destroy it all.

entries.title: Harry and Meghan: Seven takeaways from their Netflix series
entries.description: Katie Razzall's seven takeaways from the Duke and Duchess of Sussex's Netflix documentary

entries.title: The Papers: 'Harry's jibe' and 'NHS in crisis'
entries.description: The nurses' strike and the fallout from Prince Harry's Netflix docuseries feature in several of Friday's papers.
